narrative.narrative: Founded in 1995 as Deer Jet Airlines, Beijing Capital Airlines base is at the airport it takes its name from, Beijing Capital Airport. 70% owned by Hainan airlines its entire fleet of 46 Airbus A320's and A319's are leased from Hainan Airlines. Deer Jet was spun off into its own charter airline in 2010 and the main airline was renamed Beijing Capital Airline.
